Comments.GetPath: This is the path to your geth executable , this is already set to your testchain path, with the preconfigured genesis, if you work on linux, mac download the right executable, and in windows to updated
Comments.AccountAddress: The account address of your private key
Comments.AccountPrivateKey: The private key to sign your transactions , preconfigured to the genesis test account used by Nethereum preconfigured testchain
Comments.ManagedAccountPassword: If you want to work with managed accounts , by the client, the password for your web3 storage
Comments.ChainId: The chainId of the node to connect
Comments.Client: Geth , Ganache, Infura, External, HardHat.. The client to connect to, if External it will use the HttpUrl
Comments.InfuraNetwork: The Infura network to connect to
Comments.HttpUrl: The external http url to connect to , i.e http://localhost:8545 or other testchains etc
Comments.Ganache: When working with Ganache the chainId is 1337, 1559 is not fully supported yet, you need to set as legacy
